Package com.niklasarndt.healthchecksio.exception

Contains all classes / exception which get thrown whenever something unintended or unexpected happens.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParseException
    A ParseException is thrown whenever the Jackson API stops working (API read / write).
    UnauthorizedException
    An UnauthorizedException is thrown whenever you attempt to do something which healthchecks.io doesn't allow.

Package com.niklasarndt.healthchecksio.exception Description

Contains all classes / exception which get thrown whenever something unintended or unexpected happens. Read the Documentation of each class to find out more about why and when an exception is thrown.
Since:
1.0.1
